sentences.en: a jacket with a silk lining
As they say, every cloud has a silver lining. We have drawn lessons from the decisions taken.
sentences.cn: 正如他们所说，黑暗中总有一线光明，我们已从所作的决定中汲取了教训。

sentences.en: Aspirin can ulcer the stomach lining.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林能造成胃壁溃。

sentences.en: Aspirin can ulcerate the stomach lining.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林能造成胃壁溃.

sentences.en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 天无绝人之路,黑暗中常有一线曙光.

sentences.en: I hate lining up in the cold to go to the cinema.
sentences.cn: 我非常讨厌在大冷天里排队等着看电影.

sentences.en: It is estimated that 5,000 bank staff could be lining their own pockets from customer accounts.
sentences.cn: 据估计可能会有5,000名银行职员利用客户账户中饱私囊。

sentences.en: Lining a corridor is a wall of photographs spanning his rugby days.
sentences.cn: 走廊的一面墙上贴满了他橄榄球生涯里各个时期的照片。

sentences.en: Moss makes an attractive lining to wire baskets.
sentences.cn: 用苔藓垫在铁丝篮里很漂亮。

sentences.en: People are lining up to buy commemoration stamps.
sentences.cn: 人们正在排队购买纪念邮票.

sentences.en: The fall in inflation is the silver lining of the prolonged recession.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀的下降是长期经济衰退中的一线转机。

sentences.en: The solid rank of police officers lining the courtroom opened to let them pass.
sentences.cn: 把法庭围得水泄不通的一队警察让开一条路让他们通过。

sentences.en: the viscid lining of the intestine
Ulcers occur when the stomach's natural acids eat into the lining of the stomach.
sentences.cn: 胃酸侵蚀胃内壁引发溃疡。

sentences.en: Voters were lining up at polling places as early as 6.00 this morning, an hour before voting started.
sentences.cn: 早至今天早晨6点、离投票开始还有1个小时，选民就开始在投票点排队。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。
